description:
A boy prodigy who was awarded the Empire`s highest title for military achievements "the St. Apostle" at the youngest age in history. He is 16 years old, and wields the special double-edged sword "the Star Blade." The reason he throws himself into battles is to end the long-standing war. Soft and mild-mannered, but he will stand firm against the things that go against his beliefs.
Source: Official page
name: Iska
